DOC.HEADLINE: WORLD CUP USA ' 94 / THE FINALS ; SPOTLIGHT ; HIT SHOW
DOC.TEXT: Wednesday ' s Italy-Bulgaria semifinal was watched by 85.82 % of television viewers in Italy , according to figures released by the Italian state-run network . The game was watched by 25.8 million people in Italy . The only higher-rated show in Italy was for the 1990 World Cup semifinal against Argentina in Naples , which received an 87.25 share and was watched by 27.5 million viewers .
